description: {"blocks":[{"key":"vehf","text":"This protocol describes the characterization of the extracellular alpha-synuclein and DNAJC5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"bdqls","text":"For specific information about reagents and materials to perform an EV preparation, refer to a previous paper published by our lab www.bio-protocol.org/e3706","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":131,"length":26}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B9B60FC4430311EE8AD60A58A9FEAC02","url":"www.bio-protocol.org/e3706"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6gvhg","text":"Centrifuge the conditioned medium at 1,500 x g for   at   in a Sorvall RC 6+ centrifuge with fixed angle rotor F14S-6X250y FiberLite  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1bk8r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A2F316A0302411EE9AF9AD5E7F6BEB3E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5lf83","text":"Pour the supernatant into a new container without disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1l17i","text":"Centrifuge the supernatant at 10,000 x g for   at   in a Sorvall RC 6+ centrifuge with fixed angle rotor F14S-6X250y FiberLite","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"EF1523C0302411EE9AF9AD5E7F6BEB3E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fihnk","text":"Pour the supernatant into a new container without disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg5gj","text":"Add 35 ml of the collected supernatant into a single 38.5 ml ultra-clear tube. Repeat this step 5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tp8b","text":"times to fill a total of six 38.5 ml ultra-clear tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qbq","text":"Centrifuge the conditioned medium at 1,500 x g for   at   in a Sorvall RC 6+ centrifuge with fixed angle rotor F14S-6X250y FiberLite  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"0E8B791231BE11EEAA710A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c0qg","text":"Pour the supernatant into a new container without disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ce96","text":"Centrifuge the supernatant at 10,000 x g for   at   in a Sorvall RC 6+ centrifuge with fixed angle rotor F14S-6X250y FiberLite","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8icjn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"27A4FA2D31BE11EEAA710A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7vddq","text":"Centrifuge at ~100,000 x g (29,500 RPM) for   using a SW32 Ti rotor at   at maximum acceleration and brake.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5amjg","text":"Combine the resuspend pellet (~500 uL x 6 tubes = 3mL; +1mL PBS) and centrifuge again at 120,000  x g (36,500 RPM) x   at   in SW-55 rotor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":117,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":122,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"do94l","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54uj","text":"Resuspend the pellet again in 200uL PBS Buffer and add 1mL of 60% (1.8M) sucrose buffer (20mM Tris 7.4, 150 mM NaCl) and vortex to mix the sample evenly. The final sucrose concentration should be above 50% measured by refractometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61nqq","text":"\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7n08n","text":"After centrifugation, 0.5 ml fractions were collected from top to bottom and samples were analyzed by SDS-PAGE and immunoblot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"479pk","text":"The supernatant fractions at each step were collected and treated with methanol/chloroform to precipitate proteins which were then collected by centrifugation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58qps","text":"Pellet fractions were resuspended in sample buffer to achieve a 20-fold concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bg0cn","text":"The sedimented fractions at each step were also collected and resuspended in sample buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Medium fractionation and EV preparation
